Test Name: Herpes Simplex Virus (HSV) Molecular Detection by PCR
Specimen Type: Swabs of lesions, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), oropharyngeal samples, genital swabs
Purpose: To detect Herpes Simplex Virus DNA in clinical specimens using PCR for accurate diagnosis.
Container: Viral transport medium (for swab specimens) or sterile CSF container
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, centrifuge, biosafety cabinet class II
